mapper.insert: insert into tool_type(id, name, creator_id, create_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{creatorId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select tt.*,creator.name as creatorName, COUNT(t.id) as totalTool from tool_type tt left join user as creator on creator.id = tt.creator_id left join tool as t on t.tool_type_id = tt.id
and tt.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
group by tt.id
